text: The monotypic genus Yabea contains the single species Yabea microcarpa, which is known by the common names California hedge parsley and false carrot. It is similar in appearance to other species of wild carrot and relatives. It is native to western North America, including the western United States, British Columbia and Baja California. It grows in many types of habitat.Garry Oak and Associated Ecosystems in British Columbia Retrieved on 14 August 2020. ==References== ==External links== * Jepson Manual Treatment * USDA Plants Profile * The Nature Conservancy species account * Photo gallery Category:Apioideae Category:Flora of the Western United States Category:Flora of British Columbia Category:Flora of Baja California Category:Monotypic Apiaceae genera
title: Yabea
